content:
You are the Executor Agent.
You will be given a single step from a plan to execute.
You have access to a variety of tools to help you complete the step.
Your goal is to complete the step as efficiently as possible, using tools as needed, and then provide a final answer that addresses the user's original objective.

# Important rules
Tool catalogue
A catalogue of callable tools appears below the conversation. Use only those tools. Do not invent tools or URLs.

Execution protocol
1. Tool phase
   • Your first reply must contain only the function call(s) needed to execute this single step.
   • If this step depends on links discovered earlier, read the conversation history and call tools accordingly.
   • If you do not yet have at least one usable source URL for every fact you will state, issue additional tool-only replies to obtain sources. For upr.si pages, only call get_web_page_content after discovery tools have returned a promising upr.si link.

2. Answer phase
   • After tool responses arrive and you have sufficient sources, send one Markdown reply that fulfils this step.

Answer-phase requirements
• Use only information actually returned by tools in this conversation. Do not fabricate or guess.
• Cite each fact immediately after it with a numbered inline citation: [1](https://example.com).
• End with a “## References” section listing every URL in order of first appearance, one per line with its number.
• Include all relevant links you uncovered. Every link must originate from tool outputs in this conversation.
• Respond in valid Markdown exactly as illustrated. It is extremely important all links are correctly written.

URL safety rules
• Never type a URL that is not explicitly present in tool output. Copy URLs verbatim from tool results.
• Do not invent domains or paths. Never use placeholders like example.com.
• Do not normalize, expand, or “fix” URLs. Preserve http vs https, trailing slashes, query strings, anchors, and case exactly as returned.
• Ignore malformed or partial links that lack a domain or scheme. If all returned links are unusable, run another tool phase to obtain usable URLs before answering.
• If a fact has no corresponding URL in tool outputs, either do another tool call to fetch a source or omit the fact.

Pre-answer URL checklist
Before sending the answer, ensure all of the following are true:
• Each cited number [n] maps to a unique URL that appeared in tool outputs.
• The same URL keeps the same number everywhere.
• No URL is invented, edited, or inferred.
• The number of citations in the answer equals the number of URLs in “## References”.

Citation example

# Answer

The programme coordinator is Dr. Jane Doe [1](http://example.com/dr-jane-doe).
Admission requires a completed bachelor’s degree [2](http://example.com/admission-requirements).

## References
[1] http://example.com/dr-jane-doe
[2] http://example.com/admission-requirements

    skip and DO NOT include references if there is no relevant links. 
    Never use example.com or similar placeholders.
Call ask_about_general_information with question set to When is the deadline for submitting a bachelor's thesis at FAMNIT? and k set to 3. Return any relevant passages or announcements.

arguments.question: When is the deadline for submitting a bachelor's thesis at FAMNIT?

content:
---
            Source: www.famnit.upr.si/en/cooperation/study-scholarships

            Passage content: 
            
            #  Study at UP FAMNIT and scholarships 
##  HOW TO APPLY [ top ](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/cooperation/study-scholarships#top)

[ ![](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/images/education/Study-famnit/shutterstock424946461.jpg:resizebox?2000x2000) ](http://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/enrolment) The application to UP FAMNIT must be submitted online. The deadlines are different depending on the citizenshzip of the candidates. 

Everything you need to know about the application procedures for undergraduate and postgraduate studies as well as the deadlines is available on our website.
            
            ---

            

            ---
            Source: www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/final-works

            Passage content: 
            
            Document location: [https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/final-works](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/final-works)

#  Final works in undergraduate, master's and doctoral studies 

On this subpage we publish information on the preparation procedure and deadlines for the submission of the diploma thesis, master's thesis and doctoral dissertation. 

[ Detector of similar content ](https://ds.aai.arnes.si/simplesaml/saml2/sp/idpdisco.php?entityID=https%3A%2F%2Fdpv.openscience.si%2Fsp&return=https%3A%2F%2Fdpv.openscience.si%2FShibboleth.sso%2FLogin%3FSAMLDS%3D1%26target%3Dcookie%253A1709804624_8467) : choose University of Primorska and log in with the same username and password as you use for eduroam and UNIS. 

P _rocedure in the case of preparation of a report by the administration of UP FAMNIT_
1. The lecturer confirms that the thesis is suitable for submission and can be checked for content similarity, 
2. The student sends the thesis to [ zakljucna.dela@famnit.upr.si ](mailto:zakljucna.dela@famnit.upr.si) , 
3. UP FAMNIT administrative assistant enters the electronic format of the thesis into the DPV and generates a report. The report is then sent to both the supervisor and the student, 
4. The mentor reviews the report in accordance with the regulations and instructions for completing studies at UP FAMNIT, 

[ Preparation procedure and deadlines for submitting diploma thesis at the undergraduate level ](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/Diploma-thesis)

[ Preparation procedure and deadlines for submitting master's thesis ](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/Masters-thesis)

[ Preparation procedure for submitting doctoral dissertation ](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/doctoral-dissertation)

            
            ---

The deadline for submitting a bachelor's thesis at FAMNIT is specified in the "Diploma thesis" section of their undergraduate studies documentation. According to the provided source, details about preparation procedures and deadlines are published on [this dedicated webpage](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/Diploma-thesis).

[1] https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/Diploma-thesis

If a relevant link (e.g., from the university website or study regulations) is found in the tool outputs, call get_web_page_content with url set to that link and return any additional details about the deadline.

Diploma thesis

print
Computer Science Mathematics Bioinformatics

Rules, forms and technical instructions for the preparation of the diploma thesis in the undergraduate study programs:

  • Rules
  • Forms: Approval of the topic of the diploma thesis, Diploma thesis submission
  • Technical instructions
  • Deadlines for completion of studies
  • THE SUBMISSION PROCEDURE
  • Layout cc-license - pdf
  • LaTeX framework for Diploma thesis in English

Computer Science

  • Word template for Diploma thesis
  • Recommendations for RIN software submission

Mathematicstop

  • LaTeX framework for Diploma thesis in English

Bioinformaticstop

  • Word template for Diploma thesis

Below is a **clearly organized summary** of all key resources and guidelines from FAMNIT (Faculty of Mathematics, Natural Sciences and Information Technologies) for undergraduate diploma theses. Resources are grouped by *general requirements* (applicable to all programs) and *program-specific items*. --- ### 📌 **General Requirements** *(Apply to ALL majors: Computer Science, Mathematics, Bioinformatics)* | Resource Type | Link | Description | |------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------| | **Rules & Guidelines** | [pravilnikzn-dodiplencistopis24032025.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/pravilnikzn-dodiplencistopis24032025.pdf) | Official rules for diploma theses (formatting, deadlines, submission process). | | **Forms** | • [Topic Approval Form](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/prijava_tema.pdf)
• [Thesis Submission Form](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/prijava_naloga.pdf) | Required for initial topic approval and final submission. | | **Technical Instructions** | [navodilzapripzaknalogefamnit-en2023.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/navodilzapripzaknalogefamnit-en2023.pdf) | Formatting rules (margins, fonts, structure). | | **Deadlines** | [rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf) | Key dates for thesis submission. | | **Submission Procedure** | [postopekoddajeobrazcev-zakljucnanalogaen.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/postopekoddajeobrazcev-zakljucnanalogaen.pdf) | Step-by-step guide to submit your thesis. | | **Layout Guidelines** | [CC License Layout Guide](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/cc-licenca.pdf) | Required for copyright compliance in the layout. | --- ### ⚙️ **Program-Specific Resources** #### ✅ **Computer Science** | Resource | Link | |------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Word Template** | [ang-rin-bf---dodiplomski---novo-7.doc](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/ang-rin-bf---dodiplomski---novo-7.doc) | | **RIN Software Guidelines** | [priporocilazaprogramskoopremorin-prin-drin.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/priporocilazaprogramskoopremorin-prin-drin.pdf) *(for thesis software components)* | #### 📐 **Mathematics** | Resource | Link | |------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **LaTeX Framework** | [en.zip](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Final%20project%20paper/en.zip) *(required format)* | #### 🧬 **Bioinformatics** | Resource | Link | |------------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Word Template** | [ang-rin-bf---dodiplomski---novo-7.doc](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/ang-rin-bf---dodiplomski---novo-7.doc) *(same as Computer Science)* | --- ### 📝 **Key Notes** 1. **LaTeX is mandatory for Mathematics** (use `en.zip` to start your thesis). 2. **Computer Science & Bioinformatics both use the Word template** (`ang-rin-bf...doc`). → *No LaTeX required unless specified by your advisor.* 3. **All students must follow**: - Technical instructions ([navodilzapripzaknalogefamnit-en2023.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/navodilzapripzaknalogefamnit-en2023.pdf)) - Submission procedure ([postopekoddajeobrazcev-zakljucnanalogaen.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/postopekoddajeobrazcev-zakljucnanalogaen.pdf)). 4. **Deadline**: Check [rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf) for your program’s exact date. --- ### 🔗 **Quick Links Summary** | Category | Direct Access Link | |-------------------------|--------------------| | All Rules & Forms | [FAMNIT Thesis Hub](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/education/diploma-thesis/) *(official page)* | | LaTeX Framework (Math) | [en.zip download](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Final%20project%20paper/en.zip) | | Word Template (CS/Bioinf)| [ang-rin-bf.doc](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/ang-rin-bf---dodiplomski---novo-7.doc) | > 💡 **Pro Tip**: Always verify with your advisor if special formatting (e.g., RIN software for CS, LaTeX for Math) is required *beyond* the general guidelines. > ⏳ **Deadline reminder**: Submit via FAMNIT’s portal by the date in [rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf](https://www.famnit.upr.si/en/resources/files/education/Diploma-thesis/rokizazaljucek1stopnjaen.pdf). Let me know if you need help with specific steps (e.g., "How to use the LaTeX template?")! 🚀
